page.title: 10Recreation
page.content: To find out what recreational facilities there are in the area we went to Romiley Library. We found ther are many clubs for a variety of ages. Things to do include an eleven plus club,an eighteen plus youth club,a country dance club, a natural history society,a chess club,clubs for badminton,table tennis,karate,morris dancing and a new mums and babies club.Squash courses,keep fit and yoga classes,monster fun at Romiley swimming baths,a gym tots class,a Chadkirk nature club,a Cherry Tree playgroup,storytime at the library, a multi-gym exerciser,a sports club for the over fifties,a swimming class for the disabled and Romiley Little Theatre. There are also several football clubs and Romiley Cricket Club.
